column5: This one was fun to do . This guy wanted some originals ,but said I could add some of my own flair sort a speak.  Fire tiger version  Fire works      Also wanted some crappie jigs, so came up with these for him. Kept a few for myself of course.  What is cool with this guys ( sons buddies ) they know I am no pro tier, but they do know that these fly's are time and cost of material . They are happy to pay a fair price for what I do . They also work, which is the gratifying part for me.
You could probably tie up some great jigs for smallies too Brian.
That gold colour looks great. a display case with all the different ones would be nice.
